2.1. ä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥Â¶

ä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥ï¼ˆDependency Injectionï¼Œç®€ç§°DIï¼‰æ˜¯é¢å‘å¯¹è±¡ä¸­æ§åˆ¶åè½¬ï¼ˆInversion of Controlï¼Œç®€ç§° IoCï¼‰æœ€å¸¸è§çš„å®ç°æ–¹å¼ï¼Œä¸»è¦ç”¨æ¥é™ä½ä»£ç çš„è€¦åˆåº¦ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªä¾‹å­æ¥è¯´æ˜ä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯æ§åˆ¶åè½¬ã€‚

IoC æœ‰å¾ˆå¤šå®ç°ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ Java çš„ Spring ï¼ŒPHP çš„ Laravel ï¼Œå‰ç«¯çš„ Angular2+ ä»¥åŠ Node çš„ Nestjsç­‰ã€‚

import { Injectable } from '@nestjs/common';
import { BOOKS } from './books.mock';
import { Observable, of} from 'rxjs';

@Injectable()
export class BooksService {

    getBooks(): Observable<any> {
        let books = of(BOOKS);
        return books;
    }
}

åœ¨æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ä¸­æ³¨å…¥BooksServiceçš„å®ä¾‹ï¼š

import { Controller, Get } from '@nestjs/common';
import { BooksService } from './books.service';

@Controller('books')
export class BooksController {

    constructor(private booksService: BooksService) { }

    @Get()
    async getBooks() {
        const books = await this.booksService.getBooks();
        return books;
    }

}

BooksServiceä½œä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªprividerï¼Œéœ€è¦åœ¨moduleä¸­æ³¨å†Œï¼Œè¿™æ ·åœ¨è¯¥moduleå¯åŠ¨æ—¶ï¼Œä¼šè§£æmoduleä¸­æ‰€æœ‰çš„ä¾èµ–ï¼Œå½“moduleé”€æ¯æ—¶ï¼Œproviderä¹Ÿä¼šä¸€èµ·é”€æ¯ã€‚

controllers: [BooksController],

controllers: [BooksController],

2.3. é¢å‘åˆ‡é¢ç¼–ç¨‹Â¶

2.3.1. MiddlewaresÂ¶

Middleware å’Œ express çš„ä¸­é—´ä»¶ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ express ä¸­çš„ä¸­é—´ä»¶ï¼š

import { NestFactory } from '@nestjs/core';
import { AppModule } from './app.module';
import { Logger } from '@nestjs/common';

const config = {
    port: 3000,
    hostName: 'localhost'
}

async function bootstrap() {
const app = await NestFactory.create(AppModule);
// await app.listen(3000);
await app.listen(config.port, config.hostName, () => {
    Logger.log(
    `NestJS API server has been started on http://${config.hostName}:${config.port}`,
    )
})
}
bootstrap();

import { Injectable, CanActivate, ExecutionContext } from '@nestjs/common';
import { Observable } from 'rxjs';

@Injectable()
export class AuthGuard implements CanActivate {
    canActivate(
        context: ExecutionContext,
    ): boolean | Promise<boolean> | Observable<boolean> {
        const request = context.switchToHttp().getRequest();
        return validateRequest(request);
    }
}

validateRequest() å‡½æ•°ä¸­çš„é€»è¾‘å¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®éœ€è¦å˜å¾—ç®€å•æˆ–å¤æ‚ã€‚æœ¬ä¾‹çš„ä¸»è¦ç›®çš„æ˜¯è¯´æ˜ä¿æŠ¤å¦‚ä½•é€‚åº”è¯·æ±‚/å“åº”å‘¨æœŸã€‚

æ¯ä¸ªä¿æŠ¤å¿…é¡»å®ç°ä¸€ä¸ªcanActivate()å‡½æ•°ã€‚æ­¤å‡½æ•°åº”è¯¥è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªå¸ƒå°”å€¼ï¼ŒæŒ‡ç¤ºæ˜¯å¦å…è®¸å½“å‰è¯·æ±‚ã€‚å®ƒå¯ä»¥åŒæ­¥æˆ–å¼‚æ­¥åœ°è¿”å›å“åº”(é€šè¿‡ Promise æˆ– Observable)ã€‚Nestä½¿ç”¨è¿”å›å€¼æ¥æ§åˆ¶ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªè¡Œä¸º:

  1. å¦‚æœè¿”å› true, å°†å¤„ç†ç”¨æˆ·è°ƒç”¨ã€‚
  2. å¦‚æœè¿”å› false, åˆ™ Nest å°†å¿½ç•¥å½“å‰å¤„ç†çš„è¯·æ±‚ã€‚

export const BOOKS = [
    { id: 1, title: 'First book', description: "This is the description for the first book", author: 'Olususi Oluyemi' },
    { id: 2, title: 'Second book', description: "This is the description for the second book", author: 'John Barry' },
    { id: 3, title: 'Third book', description: "This is the description for the third book", author: 'Clement Wilfred' },

];

2.8. Get booksÂ¶

import { Injectable } from '@nestjs/common';
import { BOOKS } from './books.mock';
import { Observable, of} from 'rxjs';

@Injectable()
export class BooksService {

    getBooks(): Observable<any> {
        let books = of(BOOKS);
        return books;
    }
}

æ³¨æ„ï¼šå› ä¸ºNestè®¢é˜…äº†è¿”å›çš„æµï¼Œå¹¶ä½¿ç”¨æ­¤æµç”Ÿæˆçš„å€¼æ¥ä¸ºæœ€ç»ˆç”¨æˆ·åˆ›å»ºå•ä¸ªå“åº”æˆ–å¤šä¸ªå“åº”ã€‚

  1. of(BOOKS) è¿”å›å…¨éƒ¨çš„æ•°ç»„

2.9. Inject service into controllerÂ¶

 1

import { Controller, Get } from '@nestjs/common';
import { BooksService } from './books.service';

@Controller('books')
export class BooksController {

    constructor(private booksService: BooksService) { }

    @Get()
    async getBooks() {
        const books = await this.booksService.getBooks();
        return books;
    }

}
